subject: Soccer
Football Association Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Wigan became the first team to be relegated and win the English F.A. Cup in the same season after a loss at Arsenal on Tuesday ended its eight-year stay in the Premier League.
snippet: Wigan became the first team to be relegated and win the English F.A. Cup in the same season after a loss at Arsenal on Tuesday ended its eight-year stay in the Premier League.
